Package uk.ac.ed.inf.Navigation

Record Class LngLat

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
uk.ac.ed.inf.Navigation.LngLat
Record Components:
lng - longitude of the point
lat - latitude of the point
public record LngLat(double lng, double lat) extends Record
Representation of the point on a 2D plane.

    • LngLat

      public LngLat(double lng, double lat)
      Creates an instance of a LngLat record class.
      Parameters:
      lng - the value for the lng record component
      lat - the value for the lat record component

  • Method Details

    • strictlyInsideArea

      public boolean strictlyInsideArea(List<LngLat> corners)
      Checks if this point is inside the given area boundaries. If the point is on the boundary, it is classified as either inside or outside. The idea has been adapted from: http://www.ecse.rpi.edu/Homepages/wrf/Research/Short_Notes/pnpoly.html Can also access through the following link: https://stackoverflow.com/a/8721483
      Parameters:
      corners - the coordinates of the polygon corners.
      Returns:
      true if this point is strictly within the given polygon; false if this point is outside the given area.

    • pointBetweenCorners

      public boolean pointBetweenCorners(LngLat corner1, LngLat corner2)
      Checks is this point lies on the line strictly between the two given points.
      Parameters:
      corner1 - first ending of the line.
      corner2 - second ending of the line.
      Returns:
      true if this point is on the line strictly between the two given points; false otherwise.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(LngLat other)
      Checks if the other LngLat object has equal coordinates to this LngLat object.
      Parameters:
      other - the other LngLat object.
      Returns:
      true if the other LngLat object has equal coordinates, false otherwise.

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo(LngLat other)
      Calculates the Pythagorean distance between this point and the given point.
      Parameters:
      other - the point to calculate the distance to.
      Returns:
      Pythagorean distance in degrees to the given point.

    • closeTo

      public boolean closeTo(LngLat other)
      Checks if the distance between this point and the given is strictly less than the constant CLOSE defined in the specification (0.00015)
      Parameters:
      other - the point to which the distance is checked
      Returns:
      true if the point is within the distance tolerance defined in specification (currently close if distance less than 0.00015); false otherwise.

    • nextPosition

      public LngLat nextPosition(Direction direction)
      Calculates the next point coordinates, given the enum direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - one of the 16 compass directions or hover action.
      Returns:
      new LngLat record with the updated coordinates.

      public final String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
